title: Championship Choices + Ballers AMA, #JaundiceJason - Fantasy Football Podcast for 12/29
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, tough Championship Week decisions, injury updates, and a Week 17 edition of Buy or Sell! Plus, a peek behind the scenes during the AMA part of Mailbag! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast -- Fantasy Football Podcast for December 29th, 2021.
  
 (05:00) - Quick Question: Offseason Research
 (09:35) - Buy or Sell
 (21:10) - News & Notes
 (29:20) - Mailbag
 (30:55) - Kyler Murray or Joe Burrow?
 (36:40) - Which Baller is the best at Madden?
 (41:05) - Rashaad Penny or Darrel Williams?
 (43:15) - Rather lose by a little or a lot?
 (46:05) - Cordarrelle Patterson or Jaylen Waddle?
 (46:10) - Tyler Lockett or Justin Fields in superflex?
 (47:05) - Antonio Gibson or Devin Singletary?
 (48:50) - When do your Christmas trees come down?
 (51:50) - Hunter Henry or Gerald Everett?
 (54:05) - How tall are you guys?
  
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
